reviews.text: Huge thanks to Arron, Natalia, and the Sailing Whitsundays team for an incredible 2D2N Getaway trip! My wife and I did this trip as part of our honeymoon in September 2025 and highly recommend it. Thank you!

reviews.text: Very amazing trip on the Whitehaven Dreamer.Dave the captain is very passionate. Emily the host was very kind. I recommend. We saw whales, dolphins. We swam with turtles, fishes etc..  thanks a lot.
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Sailing Whitsundays (owner)5 months agoHi Jesus,Thank your for the review and for sharing your photos. Sounds like you had such an amazing time in the Whitsundays! Overnight sailing tours and scenic flights are two of the top experiences in the area - happy to hear you got to enjoy both! Let us know if you need help planning any more adventures around Australia. Happy travels!Warm regards,Sailing Whitsundays

reviews.text: Sailing Whitsundays (owner)a month agoHi Romi,Thank you for the review, feedback, and photos. Glad to hear you enjoyed the snorkelling and most of your experiences in the Whitsundays! That is a fair point about the sails, and thanks for sharing your concerns. Sometimes the wind conditions at sea aren't conducive to sailing, so the captain has to use the motor to ensure the trip can still run smoothly. Nevertheless, we are happy that your experience was overall a positive one!Warm regards,Sailing Whitsundays
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Hi Romi,Thank you for the review, feedback, and photos. Glad to hear you enjoyed the snorkelling and most of your experiences in the Whitsundays! reviews.text: Sailing Whitsundays (owner)4 months agoHi Corentin,Thanks for the fantastic review! We're so glad you and your partner enjoyed your 3-day adventure on British Defender – even with less-than-perfect weather, it looks like a brilliant time on the water.If you're planning future travels, we also offer trips across Australia and worldwide, and we’d love to help with your next journey, wherever you want to go!Thanks again for your kind words, we appreciate you taking the time!Kind regards,The Sailing Whitsundays Team

reviews.text: A gorgeous evening on the Wings boat for a sunset sail! The crew were great and the boat was spacious and perfect for watching the sunset over airlie beach. Would recommend!
